description: This file contains test functions for the 'Agent' class, specifically testing image input capabilities and session memory handling within the agent's run method. It uses external modules such as 'agno.agent.agent', 'agno.media', and 'agno.models.openai.chat'.

methods.name: test_agent_image_input
methods.description: Tests the agent's ability to process an image input along with a prompt and verifies session memory updates.

methods.name: test_agent_image_input_no_prompt
methods.description: Tests the agent's ability to process an image input without an explicit prompt and verifies session memory updates.
